description: Detects suspicious Windows Error Reporting manager (wermgr.exe) process patterns - suspicious parents / children, execution folders, command lines etc.
author: Florian Roth
name: Suspicious WERMGR Process Patterns
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\wermgr.exe AND (NOT (process.executable.text:(*C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*))))) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:*\\wermgr.exe AND process.executable.text:(*\\nslookup.exe OR *\\ipconfig.exe OR *\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe OR *\\whoami.exe OR *\\netstat.exe OR *\\systeminfo.exe OR *\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe))))
